name: Gunslinger

hit_points.hit_points_higher_levels: 1d10 (or 6) + Constitution modifier per Gunslinger level after 1st

equipment: A Gunslinger's kit (includes firearm maintenance tools, 20 rounds of ammunition)

1.name: Gunslinger's Focus
1.description:
You gain a pool of Focus Points equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1). You can spend Focus Points to:
- Deadeye Shot (1 point): Gain advantage on an attack roll with a firearm.
- Quick Draw: Add Focus points (up to 3) to your initiative roll.
Focus Points replenish after a short or long rest.

2.name: Gunplay
2.description: You can attack twice whenever you take the Attack action with a firearm.

3.name: Gunslinger Creed
3.description: Choose a creed that defines your Gunslinger: The Protector, The Avenger, The Wanderer. Each creed grants features at 3rd, 7th, 10th, and 15th levels.

5.name: Fan the Hammer
5.description: As an action, spend 2 Focus Points to make an attack against every creature in a 15-foot cone. Targets must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Dexterity modifier) or take 1d6 piercing damage per your Gunslinger level.

6.name: Gunslinger's Reflexes
6.description: Add proficiency bonus to AC against one ranged attack per round.

9.name: Ka-Tet Bond
9.description: As a bonus action, give an ally within 30 feet advantage on their next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

11.name: Endless Focus
11.description: Once per day, when you roll initiative, regain all your Focus Points.

14.name: Ricochet Shot
14.description: Make an attack roll against a creature behind cover, ignoring cover penalty.

18.name: The Gunslinger's Code
18.description: As a bonus action, mark a target within 60 feet for 1 minute. You gain advantage on attacks against the target, and the target has disadvantage on saving throws against your abilities.

20.name: The White Tower
20.description:
Once per long rest, for 1 minute:
- All Focus Point abilities cost 0 points.
- Movement speed doubles.
- Firearm attacks crit on rolls of 18-20.

3.name: Shield Ally
3.description: Use your reaction to impose disadvantage on an attack against an ally within 5 feet.

10.name: Inspiring Presence
10.description: Allies within 30 feet add your Wisdom modifier to saving throws.

15.name: Unyielding Guardian
15.description: Use your reaction to restore an ally reduced to 0 HP within 30 feet to 1 HP.

3.name: Vengeance Strike
3.description: Add 1d6 damage when hitting a creature that damaged you.

7.name: Bloody Retribution
7.description: Once per turn, deal an extra 2d6 damage to a creature below max HP.

10.name: Deadly Aim
10.description: Firearms ignore resistance to nonmagical attacks.

15.name: Executioner's Shot
15.description: Once per long rest, deal 10d10 damage on a critical hit.

3.name: Gunslinger's Mysticism
3.description: Learn two cantrips from the Druid or Wizard spell list.

7.name: Mystic Shots
7.description: Spend Focus Points to imbue bullets with elemental energy (fire, ice, or lightning).

10.name: Sixth Sense
10.description: Cast detect magic or see invisibility once per short rest.

15.name: Portal Walker
15.description: Cast dimension door once per long rest.
